summary:
This is an cinematic enb preset. Filmic tone mapping, color grading, lighting and shaders.
weatherlist support, performance friendly.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Times New Roman][color=#cccccc][center]





LaBeatBeatbox



presents






___________________

O  P  T  I  M  O  N  I  U  S
___________________





a  cinematic  enb  preset



[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71734-2-1449399758.jpg[/img]





[b]ASCEND TO GODHOOD[/b]

This enb uses cinematic features such as dynamic lighting and high contrast color grading.
Every single encounter and every battle will turn into an legendary epic with this enb. And like
all my enbs this has low performance impact.





[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71734-1-1449399758.jpg[/img]




[b]INSTALLATION[/b]

Just like any other enb. If you´re new to enbs look up the guide on the readme tab
utilises 0.279 enb version


[b]RECOMMENDED MODS[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33482/?]Minimal hud[/url][/center][/color][/font]




[center]
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71734-0-1449399758.jpg[/img][/center]
author: LaBeatBeatbox
